node.title: Firefighters battle to protect Northland village from huge scrub fire
node.description: Firefighters are using a three-pronged approach to battle a 2000 hectare scrub blaze in the Far North.
node.content:
["Firefighters are using a three-pronged approach to battle a 2000 hectare scrub blaze in the Far North.", "", "
Photo: Supplied / Reef Lodge Motel
", "Fire and Emergency Northland district manager Wipari Henwood said heavy machinery was being used to widen an old firebreak to protect the village of Kaimaumau.", "He said firefighters were assessing the structural risk of properties in Kaimaumau and, where necessary, clearing vegetation.", "Nine helicopters with monsoon buckets are also being used to wet the firebreak.", "The fire is burning through scrub and bush, mainly in a Department of Conservation wetland reserve that is 11km long.", "Kaimaumau is the only freshwater wetland in Te Tai Tokerau larger than 1000 hectares, and is home to threatened native plants.", "The haze from the fire has blown more than 100km across the top of the country - visible from as far south as Kawakawa.", "Meanwhile, neighbouring communities have visibility only for about 100m.", "", "
Evacuee Amanda McManus slept in her car overnight. Photo: RNZ / Samantha Olley
", "Despite the best efforts of fire services, Far North Mayor John Carter said the fire could burn for at least another 24 hours, and a forecast change in wind direction could potentially blow the blaze into a nearby forest.", "Last night, Kaimaumau residents packed their pets, clothes and a few valuables into cars last night to escape the blaze - forced to spend the night at Waiharara School.", "Local resident Maria Pearce was among those stranded Waiharahara School, where she slept in a classroom overnight, with her dog close by.", "Pearce said she was trying her best to stay hopeful.", ""I just pray to God and the universe that not just my home, every home is going to be safe and okay."", "She said having families together at the school had lifted spirits.", "Residents will stay at least another night at the school as a safety precaution, and a police cordon will be in place."]
